::Feline::

She stood up and looked at HotRod. "To the pit with those bots." She 
groaned as she looked at the gash in her side. Then she looked back 
up at HotRod."We showed them that they can't just come in here and 
pick a fight without getting thier tails slagged."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod ran up besides Feline. He fired two missiles at the 
retreating
> bots.
> "Run you rusted pieces of scrap!"
> 
> ::War Machine::
> 
> The huge gestalt shook the ground, as he moved into position.
> He sprayed the enemy with plasma charges. Retreating or not.
> 
> OOC: Just incase you are confused. When KSL's, Zardus's, and my War
> Machine charrs are in gestalt mode, War Machine can be controled by 
each
> of us.
